body:
We have sent you a confirmation email including your completed application.

### What happens next

We have sent your application to the Miscarriages of Justice team.

Your case will be allocated accordingly, and they will be touch in due course with an update, no later than 3 months from the date of your application.

If you want to send any other documents to support your application, you can email these to <mojas@justice.gov.uk>. You need to include your first and last name in the subject line of the email.

### Sending supporting documents by post

You can also send any supporting documents by post to the following address:

Miscarriages of Justice team 
Criminal Justice Group  
Ministry of Justice   
3rd Floor, Post Point 3.52   
102 Petty France   
London   
SW1H 9AJ   

[What did you think of this form?](https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/YNL9JFG)
heading: Application sent
